# Research Project

The goal of ResearchProject is to scaffold reproducible research projects

## Installation

You can install ResearchProject from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Lingtax/ResearchProject")
```
